pageContent: Introduction: To evaluate the feasibility and efficacy of salvage endoscopic extraperitoneal radical prostatectomy (EERPE) in recurrent prostate cancer after failed high intensity focused ultrasound therapy (HIFU), external beam radiotherapy (EBT) and brachytherapy.
